hours_text:
#### Hours

Regular admission hours:

  * Thursday: 11am – 7pm (Free Day, No Admission Fee)
  * Friday: 11am – 7pm
  * Saturday: 11am – 5pm
  * Sunday: 1pm – 5pm

Access to archival collections by appointment.

Note that LA&M is closed on November 27th, December 25th and January 1st.

Admission

The museum is open to patrons 18 years of age and over.

  * Admission is $10.00
  * Admission for Students, Seniors & Military personnel is $5.00 (ID card required)
  * No charge for current members
  * No charge to access the library for anyone
  * Last admission to the exhibits is 30 minutes before closing time
  * Group Tours: [Please contact us for details](/about/contact-us/)

#### Physical Accessibility

The LA&M’s building is only accessible by stairs.

#### Discount Admission Tickets

#### Purchasing tickets online:

You can purchase your museum admission tickets online prior to your visit and save $2 off of the regular $10 admission price. [Click here to get your tickets online](https://lam-103413.square.site/)

Online ticket purchases will be emailed to you. Present your receipt via your smart phone or a printed copy when you arrive at the Patron Services counter. A valid ID may be required. The museum is open to patrons 18 years of age and over.

#### Directions to the LA&M

The Leather Archives & Museum is located at 6418 N. Greenview Ave, just north of Devon in Rogers Park.

[Click here](https://www.google.com/maps/dir//6418+N+Greenview+Ave,+Chicago,+IL+60626/@41.9986869...
